How to get to Convergences World Forum? Which transportation means to use? What kind of accomodation can be found? Read our practical information to facilitate your travel arrangement.

excerpt.rendered: How to get to Convergences World Forum? Which transportation means to use? What kind of accomodation can be found? Read our practical information to facilitate your travel arrangement. 5 and 6 SeptemberPalais Brongniart, 28 place de la bourse, 75002 PARIS     THE FORUM ENVIRENMENTALLY RESPONSIBLE GUIDE
